Description S newScriptableObjectVariable ScriptableObjectVariable VariableReference(M) Constructor with reference to MonoBehaviourVariable containing a value ( ReferenceType = ReferenceTypes.MONOBEHAVIOURVARIABLE) Declaration public VariableReference(M newMonoBehaviourVariable) Parameters Type Name Description M newMonoBehaviourVariable MonoBehaviourVariable Fields LocalValue Declaration protected T LocalValue Field Value Type Description T MonoBehaviourValue Declaration protected M MonoBehaviourValue Field Value Type Description M ScriptableObjectValue ValueToString() Return the result of Value.ToString() Declaration public override string ValueToString() Returns Type Description String Value as a string Overrides VariableReference.ValueToString() Operators Implicit(T to VariableReference<T, S, M>) Declaration public static implicit operator VariableReference<T, S, M>(T Value) Parameters Type Name Description T Value Returns Type Description VariableReference <T, S, M> Implicit(VariableReference<T, S, M> to T) Allow to read Value directly without having to write 'reference.Value' Declaration public static implicit operator index.html.title: Variable Reference | Variable Reference
index.html.keywords: Variable Reference Improvement of the ScriptableObjectVariable system from Ryan Hipple ( https://github.com/roboryantron/Unite2017 ) with the following added : MonoBehaviourVariables (for scenes only variables) Direct access to the referenced data in the inspector UIText and UITextMeshPro extention that allow to directly update a GUI text field with the variable value for easy debug Variable reference SO & Mono Creator for custom types Installation Install via git url by adding this entry in your manifest.json "com.lemoissonneur.variablereference": "https://github.com/lemoissonneur/VariableReference.git#upm"
